frontMatter.title: Search results
frontMatter.description: Template for displaying pages containing links to content that matched a user's search query.
frontMatter.intro: A template for displaying pages containing links to content that matched a user's search query, with optional filtering and sorting capabilities.

when_to_use.value: **Site search results.** Displaying results from site-wide search.
**Resource and support pages.** Listing filtered resources.
**Medication, appointment, or claims lists.** User-specific data.
**Knowledge base searches.** Documentation and help content.

usability.value: **Sorting.** Add only when reordering provides user value. Triggers inline without additional buttons.
**Filtering.** Occurs inline on current page. Preserves selected filter visibility after updates.
**Layout.** Use persistent left sidebar when search is the primary feature. Employ filter chips when displaying 3+ facets.

structure.intro: The search results page may include these components (not all required).

sections.title: Active filters
sections.description: Chips showing currently applied filter values.

sections.title: Filters
sections.description: Search Filter component with checkboxes/radio buttons.

sections.title: Search results
sections.description: Individual result entries with title link, description, and URL.

content_guidelines.value: Results description format: 'Showing 1-10 of results for "[query]"'.
Results must update when filters change to reflect current output.
Title link should match the destination page's H1.
Description should be meta description with bolded matching search terms.
Distinguish clearly between sort and filter functionality.

accessibility.value: **Focus management.** Move focus to results after filtering.
**Live region announcements.** Announce result count updates.
**State preservation.** Keep filters visible and selected.
**Loading states.** Announce when results are updating.
**Error handling.** Provide clear, simple error messages.
**Three+ facets.** Use filter chips to display active selections.
